name: Keep On Snackin'
description:
Keep on Snackin' How to play

That's you! Aren't you a handsome one. Use the arrow keys to move.

This is a good snack. Worth 10 points.

Avoid these guys! They hurty.

Xtra healthy. This snack will earn you +2 Health.

So tasty. This one gives you 15 points.

Delectable. Gets rid of bees.
